items.name: Lucid Amulet
items.desc: Ancient charm that boosts focus in the dream temple.
items.lore: Forged in the deepest chambers of the dream temple, this amulet resonates with the ambient psychic energy of lucid dreamers.

items.name: Ekram's Panties
items.desc: Faint shame aura that doubles Dirty Token rewards.
items.effect: +100% Dirty Token gain, +5 shame XP per confession
items.lore: These sacred undergarments once belonged to the legendary Mistress Ekram herself. They pulse with otherworldly shame energy.

items.name: Dream Shard
items.desc: Crystalline currency of the Astral Map.
items.lore: Fragments of pure dream energy, crystallized into tradeable form.

items.name: Moonwater Elixir
items.desc: Drink to restore lucidity after a nightmare crawl.
items.lore: Brewed under the full moon using tears of sleeping angels.

items.name: Quest Glyph
items.desc: Unlocks the next stage of a temple storyline.
items.lore: Ancient symbols that hold the keys to forgotten temple mysteries.

items.name: Panty Relic of Shame
items.desc: Cursed undergarment that amplifies shameful desires.
items.lore: Woven from the fabric of regret itself, this relic carries the weight of a thousand confessions.

items.name: Crown of Obedience
items.lore: Crafted for those who have mastered the art of surrender, this crown marks true submission.

items.name: Robes of the Dream Walker
items.desc: Ethereal garments that shimmer between dimensions.
items.effect: +30% dream recall, immunity to nightmare effects
items.lore: These robes exist partially in the dream realm, allowing the wearer to walk between worlds.

items.name: Boots of Silent Steps
items.desc: Silent footwear for stealthy temple exploration.
items.lore: Made from shadow leather, these boots make no sound even on the creakiest temple floors.

items.name: Dirty Token
items.desc: Shameful currency earned through confession and submission.
items.lore: Each token represents a moment of shame embraced and acknowledged.

items.name: Collar of Devotion
items.desc: Symbol of unwavering dedication to the temple.
items.lore: Worn by the most devoted temple servants, this collar binds the soul to sacred duty.

items.name: Vial of Liquid Shame
items.desc: Concentrated essence of embarrassment and regret.
items.effect: Instant +100 shame XP, temporary shame aura for 30 minutes
items.lore: The physical manifestation of shame itself, distilled into liquid form.

items.name: Crystal of Desire
items.desc: Crystallized forbidden thoughts and deepest longings.
items.effect: Double XP gain for next ritual, unlock hidden desires
items.lore: Contains the concentrated essence of every forbidden thought that has ever crossed a dreamer's mind.

items.name: Nightmare Ward
items.desc: Protective charm against dark dream entities.
items.effect: Immunity to fear effects, +20% defense in dungeons
items.lore: Forged from the defeat of countless nightmares, this ward repels dark energies.

items.name: Lucid Dream Shard
items.desc: Fragment of pure conscious control over dreams.
items.effect: +50% dream recall for 24 hours, unlock lucid abilities
items.lore: This shard contains the essence of perfect lucidity, allowing unprecedented dream control.

bonus.3_piece: +50% shame XP, master shame aura, unlock Shame Lord title
